name: Escape From Utopia
description:
Life in Utopia is perfect, there's no poverty, unemployment, or crime. People are created in labs and are genetically enhanced to precisely fit their role in Utopia. Everyone is content, including you.

Until one day,  a patient shows up at the Adjustment Center where you work, and makes you realize that life has no meaning unless you have free will. Now, you must escape to the mysterious land of Realis where you can truly be free.

Note: There's a walkthrough file in the downloads section in case anyone gets stuck.
